title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. VI, pt. 305 - Controls/restrictions/restraints
content:

State Regulations
§ 305.1 - Frisks
§ 305.2 - Deprivation order
§ 305.3 - Use of restraints, generally
§ 305.4 - Restraint orders
§ 305.5 - Closing cell hatch covers
§ 305.6 - Use of cell shields

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. VI, pt. 305

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§70, 112, 138

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
